name: Shark Onslaught
description:
A simple tower defense game about merpeople and fish fighting sharks. Survive as many rounds as possible against endless waves of sharks. There are 3 maps to choose from which each have different difficulties to offer.

Game Designed by: Marc-Julian Galicha

Engineered by: Ethan Bowen and Alex Egan

Art by: Ivan Lee and Penny Lewis

This game was made for Alternative Game Development at the UofU in the spring of 2020. It was made in about a month after a pandemic up heaved our class.
